So this is it. The world's most pretentious book club.

Living Up to the Name

27 Aug 2010

Okay, sorry everyone. I’ve dropped the ball during my two weeks of travel. Call it bad timing. Call it laziness. Call it whatever you want. So, in the interest of getting everyone onboard and caught up, let’s say we’ll meet Thursday, Septeber 9th. Let’s all try to gave gotten through the first few chapters and the intro. See you all then!

If this is a problem for anyone let me know.
— Matt Kern
